Title: Raises the monetary value of damaged property that is considered criminal mischief or securities fraud
Summary: Raises the monetary value of damaged property that is considered criminal mischief or securities fraud.
LawCode: Amd §§145.05 & 145.10, Pen L; amd §352-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the general business law, in relation to criminal mischief and securities fraud
